title: Finish Project Proposal
description: Complete the project proposal for the new client by outlining the objectives, timeline, and budget.

title: Team Meeting
description: Conduct a team meeting to discuss the progress of the current projects and address any issues.

title: Code Review
description: Review the code submitted by the junior developers and provide feedback for improvements.

title: Client Follow-up
description: Follow up with the client regarding the project updates and address any queries they may have.

title: Update Documentation
description: Update the project documentation with the latest changes and improvements made in the project.
